unnormalised: I remember when depression hit me hard after my IIT entrance exams. It felt like a DDLJ scene gone wrong, haha! This mental health app really helped me navigate those dark days. Earlier, talking to Sharma uncle felt easier than finding a therapist. Now, even at 2 AM, I have support. A big relief!
normalised: I remember when depression hit me hard after my I I T entrance exams. It felt like a D D L J scene gone wrong, ha ha! This mental health app really helped me navigate those dark days. Earlier, talking to Sharma uncle felt easier than finding a therapist. Now, even at two A M, I have support. A big relief!
